name: Totally A Clicker Game
description:
This is my very first time uploading a game! That said, it's incomplete...

Moreover, it started out as a clicker, but somewhere along the way I found a cool tutorial and it became a freakin space shooter.

*** (WASD or arrow keys to move), (spacebar or mouse LB to shoot)

I plan on continuing workin on this game to see how cool I can make it!

All assets and music were made by me. It's not a clicker game, but I learned a lot and had fun. Hope ya enjoy my lil project! 

Cheers! >~<
